paragraphs.name: 493b
paragraphs.text: The relationship between pick-and-roll offense and defense is not unlike the relationship between the flu and its vaccine. Each year, a new vaccine must be created to minimize the flu’s potential damage on the immune system. Teams have used different variations of the pick-and-roll for years, and new variants became more prominent last season. Teams began to integrate a “slide pick-and-roll,” which Warriors head coach Steve Kerr described on The Bill Simmons Podcast as “kind of a fake pick-and-roll,” where the setter fakes the screen and darts to the 3-point line instead of making contact with the ball handler’s defender. It looked like this:

efe1b864c4fa.title: Has Dellavedova EVER set a legal screen? Must be an Aussie thing.

paragraphs.text: Has Dellavedova EVER set a legal screen? Must be an Aussie thing.
Damn, Gobert’s got happy ft. (& hips & butt!) on those screens — know NBA’s pretty lax w/ it, but those’re pretty close to moving…

710b71aa4fee.title: I absolutely love these types of articles.

paragraphs.text: I absolutely love these types of articles. I wish more high school and college coaches would read them and try to implement some of the plays discussed. I realize the talent level isn’t the same but what the Jazz and Rockets are doing is just beautiful well designed basketball.

857346bd6010.title: This article goes to show a big reason why Malone-Stockton worked so well.

paragraphs.text: This article goes to show a big reason why Malone-Stockton worked so well. The pick-n-roll is so incredibly versatile for any set of players. You just have to find that sweet spot. It’s beautiful to watch when it works and extremely fun to play when a team understands how to set a pick-n-roll.

bbc2e9f26056.title: I don’t think the “slide” pick and roll is that new or ingenious.

paragraphs.text: I don’t think the “slide” pick and roll is that new or ingenious. Teams have been slipping screens forever, heck my team did it in middle school. Not sure why its such a new and exciting development
